mapper.select: SELECT TB_QSTN.QSTN_NO AS QSTN_NO , TO_CHAR(QSTN_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS QSTN_DT , TB_QSTN.QSTN_ANS AS QSTN_ANS , TO_CHAR(QSTN_ANS_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS QSTN_ANS_DT , TB_QSTN.EMP_NO AS TB_QSTN , TB_QSTN.STU_NO AS STU_NO , TB_QSTN.QSTN_TTL AS QSTN_TTL , TB_STU.USER_NM AS USER_NM FROM TB_QSTN JOIN TB_STU ON TB_STU.STU_NO = TB_QSTN.STU_NO WHERE TB_QSTN.STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND TB_QSTN.SBJCT_CD = #{sbjctCd} ORDER BY TB_QSTN.QSTN_DT DESC

SELECT TB_QSTN.QSTN_NO AS QSTN_NO , TB_QSTN.SBJCT_CD AS SBJCT_CD , TB_QSTN.QSTN_TTL AS QSTN_TTL , TB_QSTN.QSTN_CN AS QSTN_CN , TB_QSTN.QSTN_DT AS QSTN_DT , TB_QSTN.QSTN_ANS AS QSTN_ANS , TB_QSTN.QSTN_ANS_DT AS QSTN_ANS_DT , TB_EMP.USER_NM AS USER_NM , TB_QSTN.STU_NO AS STU_NO , TB_STU.USER_NM AS STU_NM FROM TB_QSTN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP ON TB_EMP.EMP_NO = TB_QSTN.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STU ON TB_STU.STU_NO = TB_QSTN.STU_NO WHERE TB_QSTN.QSTN_NO = #{qstnNo}
SELECT TB_EMP.USER_PROFILE AS USER_PROFILE , TB_EMP.USER_NM AS USER_NM FROM TB_SBJCT JOIN TB_EMP ON TB_EMP.EMP_NO = TB_SBJCT.EMP_NO WHERE TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD = #{sbjctCd}
